definitions.definition: The action or process of graduating and receiving a diploma for completing a course of study (such as from an educational institution ).
examples: The graduation ball was the students' chance to say goodbye to each other.
After my graduation , I took a year out to travel, then went into an office job.

definitions.definition: The action or process of leaving a group.
A marking (e.g., on a container) indicating a measurement on a scale , usually one of many such markings.
The exposure of a liquid in large surfaces to the air, so as to hasten its evaporation.

main_definition: The action or process of graduating and receiving a diploma for completing a course of study (such as from an educational institution ).
